div.aria-label: Valmeyer CUSD#3 has risen to new heights since the flood of 93. The school is the center piece of the town, which relocated from the river bottoms to the top of the bluff. The new town shadows the old as the sun rises each day. From its farming roots, the new town is slowly transitioning to somewhat of a bedroom community. Along with residential growth, the town is also anticipating additional commercial development in Rock City Industrial Park. This growth is providing exciting challenges and opportunities for the school district, as we are planning for the expansion of our school building. We are very proud of our educational facility, and the education we provide. We have embraced our vision of students achieving, teachers challenging, and families flourishing in all aspects of curricular and extra-curricular activities. We devote much time, resources, thought and reflection in accomplishing this vision. We invite you to tour our school and town through our new website and web links. We also invite you to come and visit in person to experience for yourself what we are proud to be a part of.

p.span: Valmeyer Community Unit School District 3 provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
